verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Thine the glory, hallelujah! Amen! Hallelujah! Thine the glory, revive us again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise thee, O God, for the Son of thy love, for Jesus who died, and is now gone above.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise thee, O God, for thy Spirit of light who has shown us our Savior and scattered our night.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory and praise, to the Lamb that was slain, Who has borne all our sins, and has cleansed every stain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive us again, fill each heart with thy love. May each soul be rekindled with fire from above.{/lang-eng}
